title: kernel bypass techniques
extract: Here is a list of the most widely known kernel bypass techniques.PACKET_MMAP. Packet_mmap is a Linux API for fast packet sniffing. ... PF_RING. PF_RING is another known technique that intends to speed up packet capture. ... Snabbswitch. ... DPDK. ... Netmap.Sep 7, 2015
extract_html:
Here is a list of the most widely known kernel bypass techniques.
  1. PACKET_MMAP. Packet_mmap is a Linux API for fast packet sniffing. ...
  2. PF_RING. PF_RING is another known technique that intends to speed up packet capture. ...
  3. Snabbswitch. ...
  4. DPDK. ...
  5. Netmap.
Sep 7, 2015
